title: Bolt of cloth

Item ID8790

A bolt of cloth is used in the Construction skill to build objects such as wooden beds, curtains and also rugs. Bolts of cloth provide 15 Construction experience each when used.

One bolt of cloth is used in the quest Making Friends with My Arm, and five are used in the Daddy's Home miniquest.
